name: I.C.S. | Console
description: Designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 1999, the I.C.S. Console has a strong identity that makes it a unique piece in the universe of Ceccotti Collezioni consoles. It features sbittata processing, achieved by superimposing pressed veneers and creating a special knurling through machine milling. Available in solid wood with options for a wooden or marble top, it comes in two sizes: 136 cm with three drawers and 180 cm with four drawers. Base options include burnished brass or steel.
